name: Hard Techno
description: Typically rave-oriented form characterized by hard, prominent kick drums, pounding rhythms, fast tempos around 140-160 BPM, and aggressive, often distorted sounds.

children.name: Schranz
children.description: Characterised by fast tempos, aggressive "whooshing" beat patterns, heavy compression and straightforward song structures.
